de.affect.tools

Class AffectScripts2HTML

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.affect.tools.AffectScripts2HTML

  • public class AffectScripts2HTML
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for generating HTML files out of affectscripts.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Convert affectscripts contained in given script dir into a human readable HTML file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AffectScripts2HTML

        public AffectScripts2HTML(java.lang.String compSpecs,
                  java.lang.String defSpecs,
                  java.lang.String dictFile,
                  java.lang.String language,
                  java.lang.String scriptsDir,
                  java.lang.String outFile,
                  boolean showFilename,
                  boolean showTags,
                  boolean generateQuestions,
                  boolean generateEmotions,
                  boolean generateMoods)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException
        Convert affectscripts contained in given script dir into a human readable HTML file.
        Parameters:
        compSpecs - Computation specification file (only needed if generating emotions or moods).
        defSpecs - Character definitions file (only needed if generating emotions or moods).
        dictFile - The dictionary file to use.
        language - The language used for converting tags.
        scriptsDir - Where the scripts are stored.
        outFile - The filename of the HTML file that is to be created.
        showFilename - Whether to show or not to show the filename.
        showTags - Indicates whether tag annotations should be displayed or removed.
        generateQuestions - Append the generated questions. If showTags is true questions about the tag will be included additionally.
        generateEmotions - If true and generateQuestions is true each script is executed and questions about the characters emotions will be generated.
        generateMoods - Same as generateEmotions but for moods.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any file cannot be opened.
        org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException - If the affect manager could not be properly initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException
        Main routine. Converts all scripts in provided directory into a single HTML file.
        Parameters:
        args - Program arguments.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any file cannot be opened.
        org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException - If the affect manager could not be properly initialized.
